jobInfo.postDescription:
职位描述:
1.协助监制把关制作全流程。
2.协助监制开发及维护客户。

职位要求:
1.本科及以上学历，有广告代理公司或制作公司工作经历优先。
2.可支持相关职业经历投递，广告创意、广告制片加分。
3.可使用苹果电脑，熟练操作PPT、Keynote、Excell等办公软件。
4.希望你耐心、细心，抗压能力强。

brandComInfo.introduce:
大棒映画（北京）文化传播有限公司（BangStudio）成立于2016年，位于北京影视新坐标的七棵树创意园内，是一家以视觉影像创意为驱动核心的全域内容制作提供商，自成立以来，BangStudio已为国内外众多一线优秀品牌提供最具影响⼒的影像产品。
      BangStudio至今已与多个品牌、艺⼈与媒体合作，提供国际标准的制作服务，服务客户类型涵盖电商、快销品、电⼦产品、汽车、化妆品、体育赛事、政府机关等众多领域，如淘宝网、京东、字节跳动、抖音、快手、斗鱼、腾讯游戏、BMW中国、H&M、MINI中国、中国李宁、华为、ModernSky，联想、哔哩哔哩等优秀品牌。年产出优秀影像作品百余支、合作国内外优秀艺人数百位。
    BangStudio业务涉及⼴泛，包括但并不限于品牌形象咨询、媒介购买和创意策划、电视/⽹络⼴告、节⽬、⾳乐录像带、演出及品牌活动的影像制作等。
 Bang Studio (Beijing) Culture Communication Co., Ltd. (BangStudio) was established in 2016, located in the seven trees creative park, a new landmark of Beijing's urban culture. It is a global content production provider driven by visual image creativity. Since its establishment , BangStudio has provided the most influential image products for many top brands for demestic and foreign companies.
      BangStudio has so far cooperated with many brands, artists and medias, providing international standard production services. Its customer types include e-commerce, fast-moving goods, e-products, automobiles, cosmetics, sports events, government agencies and many other fields. Customers include Taobao, JD, ByteDance, Douyin, Kuaishou, Douyu, Tencent Games, BMW China, H&M, MINI China, China Lining, Huawei, ModernSky, Lenovo, Bilibili and other outstanding corporations. It produces more than 100 excellent video works annually and cooperates with hundreds of domestic and foreign artists.
    BangStudio's business involves a wide range of services, Not limited to brand image consulting, media purchases and creative planning, TV/network announcements, festivals, music videos, performances and image production of brand events, etc.
